idea-plugin.name: Actionable
idea-plugin.description:
Adds some favorite/extra actions that are not available in IntelliJ based IDEs.

For a detailed description about all the actions, please visit the documentation
Features:
  • Collapse Empty Tag on Backspace
  • Expand Tag on Type
  • Predict Words: Camel-Case
  • Predict Words: Pascal-Case
  • Predict Words: Snake-Case
  • Predict Words: Kebab-Case
  • Predict Words: Spaced
  • Add Selection to Macros
  • Empty Line
  • Empty Line Preserving the Indent
  • Delete to Indented Line Start
  • Duplicate Lines Up
  • Duplicate Lines Down
  • Remove Duplicate Selections
  • Select Word Under Caret
  • Select Element Under Caret
  • Select Literal Element Under Caret
  • Select Text Between Quotes (Single-Line)
  • Select Text Between Double-Quotes (Single-Line)
  • Select Text Between Backticks (Single-Line)
  • Unselect First Selection
  • Unselect Last Selection
  • Move First Selection to Previous Occurrence
  • Move First Selection to Next Occurrence
  • Move Last Selection to Previous Occurrence
  • Move Last Selection to Next Occurrence
  • Move Selection Up
  • Move Selection Down
  • Move Selection Left
  • Move Selection Right
  • Add Selection to Next Occurrence
  • Add Selection to Previous Occurrence
  • Remove Carets on Empty Lines
  • Justify Carets Start
  • Justify Carets End
  • Justify Carets End and Shift Text
  • Copy Word At Caret
  • Cut Word At Caret
  • Copy Element At Caret
  • Cut Element At Caret
  • Set Copy-Paste Word Offset At Caret
  • Set Cut-Paste Word Offset At Caret
  • Set Copy-Paste Element Offset At Caret
  • Set Cut-Paste Element Offset At Caret
  • Execute Paste
  • Cancel Paste
  • Move Caret to Next Word
  • Move Caret to Next Word with Selection
  • Move Caret to Previous Word
  • Move Caret to Previous Word with Selection
  • Move Caret to Next Element
  • Move Caret to Next Element with Selection
  • Move Caret to Previous Element
  • Move Caret to Previous Element with Selection
  • Find Is Case-Sensitive
  • Auto Insert Semicolons
  • Auto Class Case
  • Just in Time Refactoring
  • Add Import
  • Start Line Up
idea-plugin.change-notes:
• 3.11.0:
    fixed issue #10
    four new actions:
    • Move First Selection to Previous Occurrence
    • Move First Selection to Next Occurrence
    • Move Last Selection to Previous Occurrence
    • Move Last Selection to Next Occurrence
  • 3.10.1:
    fixed a bug in add selection to next/previous occurrence
    Select Literal Element Under Caret: solves #3 and improvement to kotlin selection
  • 3.10.0:
    Added 'Unselect First/Last Selection' actions
    Now adding selection to previous/next occurrence will scroll the editor if necessary
  • 3.9.1:
    upgrade to use kotlin 1.7.0
    changed functionality of SelectLiteralElementUnderCaretAction (language aware; not supporting all yet)
    fix in change-notes
  • 3.9.0:
    Added select text between quotes/double-quotes/backticks action (single-line)
    Added shortcut for settings as a toggle action (Actionable -> Find -> Is find case-sensitive?)
  • 3.8.2:
    fixed a bug with start line up (Rider)
  • 3.8.1:
    fixed a bug
  • 3.8.0:
    fixed issue with registering macros
    new java action: add import (from anywhere in the document using a popup dialog)
    new java typeHandler: just-in-time refactoring for local variables
    fixed issue with CollapseEmptyTagOnBackspace
  • 3.7.0:
    fixed issue #2
    improvements to AutoClassCase and AutoInsertSemicolon (Java)
    new type handler for xml: collapse empty tag on backspace (when tag is completely empty and caret should be inside the tag)
    internal improvements
  • 3.6.0:
    Added macro feature (without simulation of typing)
    Also there is a setting for editing macros at 
    Settings -> tools -> Actionable -> Macro
  • 3.5.1:
    Improved Start Line Up action (fix for Rider)
    Now actions are dumb-aware (some are allowed to be executed while indexing)
  • 3.5.0:
    Added fix for Rider's Start New Line Before Caret in XAML files.
    Added box selection movement actions.
  • 3.4.1:
    Improved auto semicolon insertion (java)
    Bug fixes
  • 3.4.0:
    Bug fixes
    Added select literal element under caret action
    Added type handlers for:
    • HTML
      • Auto expand tag on type (experimental)
    • Java
      • Auto insert semicolons
      • Auto Change first character of class name to uppercase
  • 3.3.0:
    Added move caret to next/previous element with/without selection actions.
    Added select word/element under caret actions.
    Added predict case actions.
  • 3.2.0:
    Added Cancel Paste action
    Added Remove Duplicate Selections action
    Fixed a bug in settings
  • 3.1.0:
    Removed scripting feature in favor of better existing plugins.
    rewritten plugin in kotlin
  • 3.0.0:
    Added scripting feature for custom actions! - available at Settings -> Tools -> Actionable -> Scripting
    please visit github repo for more info.
  • 2.3.1:
    Added justify carets end and shift text action
    Minor improvements
  • 2.2.2:
    fixed invalid caret bug with justify carets actions
    improved functionality of justify carets end action
  • 2.2.1:
    Added highlighter hinting for set copy/cut-paste word/element offset
    Added configuration for the above
    renewed plugin settings categories
  • 2.2.0:
    Added set copy/cut-paste word/element offset at caret actions.
    visit repository home page for detailed information about how these actions work.
  • 2.1.0:
    Now plugins supports IntelliJ since 2017.1
    Added configuration for hard stop word separators.
    visit settings page of the plugin for more info. Settings > tools > Actionable > Caret Movement
  • 2.0.0:
    Now plugins supports IntelliJ since 2019.1.4
    Added configuration for find actions
    Minor improvements
  • 1.5.1:
    Added Add selection to next/previous occurrence
    Renamed Copy/Cut word at caret --to--> Copy/Cut element at caret
    Minor improvements
  • 1.4.1:
    Added move caret to next/previous word (+ with selection)
    Added exception reporting feature
    Minor improvements
  • 1.2.0: Added copy/cut word at caret
  • 1.1.0: Added justify carets actions
  • 1.0.1: Fixed issue with duplicate down action
  • 1.0.0: Fixed some issues with plugin.xml
  • 1.0.0-Beta: Initial Release

action.description: Collapses empty tag when backspace pressed if caret is inside the tag with absolutely no content
Expands tag on typing
Predicts the words from a raw text and rewrites them in camel-case
Predicts the words from a raw text and rewrites them in pascal-case
Predicts the words from a raw text and rewrites them in snake-case
Predicts the words from a raw text and rewrites them in kebab-case
Predicts the words from a raw text and rewrites them in spaced
Adds the current selection to the macros
Empties the line
Empties the line while preserves the line start indentation
Deletes from caret to start of the line, but won't remove the indentation
Duplicate selected line(s) above the current selection; or just the line, which caret is located at, if no selection exists
Duplicate selected line(s) below the current selection; or just the line, which caret is located at, if no selection exists
Removes duplicate selections
Selects the word under the caret
Selects the element under the caret
Selects the literal element under the caret
Selects the text between two quotes in a line
Selects the text between two double-quotes in a line
Selects the text between two backticks in a line
Removes the first selection in the editor
Removes the last selection in the editor

action.text: Move First Selection to Previous Occurrence
action.description: Moves the first selection to previous occurrence

action.text: Move First Selection to Next Occurrence
action.description: Moves the first selection to next occurrence

action.text: Move Last Selection to Previous Occurrence
action.description: Moves the last selection to previous occurrence

action.text: Move Last Selection to Next Occurrence
action.description: Moves the last selection to next occurrence
Moves selection up (Box Movement)
Moves selection down (Box Movement)
Moves selection left (Box Movement)
Moves selection right (Box Movement)
Adds selection to the next occurrence of the word in the editor
Adds selection to the previous occurrence of the word in the editor
Removes all carets that are on empty/blank lines
Justifies carets to the leftmost (needs more than one active caret)
Justifies carets to the rightmost (needs more than one active caret)

action.text: Justify Carets End and Shift Text
action.description: Justifies carets to the rightmost (needs more than one active caret) and shifts the text with the carets
Copies the Word at the caret
Cuts the Word at the caret
Copies the element at the caret
Cuts the element at the caret

action.text: Set Copy-Paste Word Offset At Caret
action.description: Please refer to documentation on github repo

action.text: Set Cut-Paste Word Offset At Caret
action.description: Please refer to documentation on github repo

action.text: Set Copy-Paste Element Offset At Caret
action.description: Please refer to documentation on github repo

action.text: Set Cut-Paste Element Offset At Caret
action.description: Please refer to documentation on github repo
Please refer to documentation on github repo
Cancels the scheduled paste action
Like the same action provided by the IDE but a bit different and configurable

action.text: Move Caret to Next Word with Selection
action.description: Like the same action provided by the IDE but a bit different and configurable
Like the same action provided by the IDE but a bit different and configurable

action.text: Move Caret to Previous Word with Selection
action.description: Like the same action provided by the IDE but a bit different and configurable
Moves the caret to next psi element

action.text: Move Caret to Next Element with Selection
action.description: Moves the caret to next psi element with selection
Moves the caret to previous psi element

action.text: Move Caret to Previous Element with Selection
action.description: Moves the caret to previous psi element with selection
A shortcut for `is find case-sensitive` option in Actionable settings
